column4: Hi, So I've installed ubuntu and xubuntu previously, and have had the wireless settings working right out of the box. Now, it doesn't even recognize my network card. I have a thinkpad t410 2516-CTO machine. Can anyone help?
steinman, more importantly, is it enabled now?
steinman, does it show up in ifconfig?
eth0 and lo are only enabled
steinman, is the hardware light on (on the computer)
can you turn it on with the switch or Fn-F5?
usually on the edge of the laptop
my t60 and w520 both have it on the front
i'm going to try to install the drivers using ndisgtk
